data.text: @AutumnOnVenus @GossipCop @MS_Waltner Desperate people wanting to be relevant will do pretty much anything...
@AutumnOnVenus @GossipCop @MS_Waltner They're really clutching at straws now 😂 they dont have any legitimate reasons to bring him up so they're just making up bullshit stories, its really sad
@GossipCop @MS_Waltner What is it with people trying to trash this man? Seriously I’m fucking sick of it.
